full_text: Be St rr pa arlene Beer 2019/KER/1I91 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW FRIDAY, THE 04TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 14TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 27 of 2019 CRIME NO. 1167/2018 OF OCHIRA POLICE STATION , KOLLAM PETITIONER/S: 1 SHAJI, AGED 41 YEARS HASSANKUNJU, THONDUKANDATHIL, SOUTH KOCHUMURI, OACHIRA, KOLLAM DISTRICT-690525. 2 HASARATH, AGED 44 YEARS S/O.ALI-AKBAR, PALLIYUDE KIZHAKATHIL, PAYIKUZHI, OACHTRA, KOLLAM DISTRICT-690525. 3 SHAMEER, AGED 42 YEARS S/O.ALI-AKBAR, PALLIYUDE KIZHAKATHIL, PAYIKUZHI, OACHTRA, KOLLAM DISTRICT-690525. 4 SHOUKATH, AGED 43 YEARS S/O.YUNUSKUNJU, SOUTH KOCHUMURI, OACHIRA, KOLLAM DISTRICT-690525. BY ADVS. SRI.K.SIJU SMT .S.SEETHA RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-31. Bel Sys a pa arlene cape 2019/KER/191 Crl.MC.No. 27 of 2019 Li2e. 2 THE STATION HOUSE OFFICER, OACHIRA POLICE STATION, KOLLAM DISTRICT, PIN- 690525. 3 HIDAYATHULLA, AGED 18 YEARS S/O.SHAJI, THONDUKANDATHIL, KOCHUMURI, KRISHNAPURAM, OACHIRA, KOLLAM DISTRICT-690525. 4 AL-AMEEN, AGED 18 YEARS S/O.NAZEER N., 'ASLAM MANZIL', KOCHUMURI, OACHIRA, KOLLAM DISTRICT-690525. BY ADV. SRI.A.MUHAMMED RAFFI OTHER PRESENT: SRI. ALEX M THOMBRA SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioners are the accused in Crime No. 1167 of 2018 of Oachira Police Station registered for the offences under Sections 294(b), 323, 341 & A277] of the Indian Penal Code. Respondents 3 & 4 are the victims. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the criminal case may be Bel Beane 2019/KER/191 Crl.MC.No. 27 of 2019 1.3.. quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners and respondents 3 & 4 and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavits filed by respondents 3 & 4, who have entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the allegation of settlement is true and no public interest is involved. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The proceedings in Crime No. 1167 of 2018 of Oachira Police Station are quashed. The learned magistrate may pass appropriate orders for the disposal of the material objects, if any, produced in the case. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE Bka/11.01.2019 Be St rr pa arlene Beer 2019/KER/1I91 Cr1.MC.No. 27 of 2019 ~.4.,. APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE 1 THE COPY OF FIR IN CRIME NO.1167/2018 OF OACHIRA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE 2 THE COPY OF FIR WITH FIS IN CRIME NO.2744/2018 OF KAYAMKULAM POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE 3 THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT REGARDING THE COMPROMISE DATED 30.11.2018. ANNEXURE 4 THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 4TH RESPONDENT REGARDING THE COMPROMISE DATED 30.11.2018.
